name: Fire
content: Lock me up inside your garden
请将我囚禁在你的花园中
Desire' taking me so much higher
I could watch you dance for hours
我能够看你数小时不停地舞蹈
I could take you by my side
我能够将你带到我身边
Desire' taking me so much higher
Oooh YEAH  is burning me up
Lock me up inside your garden
请将我囚禁在你的花园中
Desire' taking me so much higher
